ANALISIS : Bahasa Isyarat, Membaca 'Kode Keras' Kapolri
03 Nov 2019, 21:43 by Miechell Octovy Koagouw


ANALISIS : Bahasa Isyarat, Membaca 'Kode Keras' Kapolri

KBRN, Jakarta : Ketua DPR RI Puan Maharani memimpin sidang paripurna untuk mendengarkan pemaparan hasil fit and proper test Komisi III DPR RI terhadap calon Kapolri baru, Komisaris Jenderal Polisi (Komjen Pol) Idham Azis, di Kompleks Parlemen Senayan Jakarta, Kamis (31/10/2019).Dari 575 anggota DPR RI, hadir 361 orang dan semua secara aklamasi menyetujui Komjen Pol Idham Azis sebagai Kapolri baru menggantikan Jenderal Polisi Tito Karnavian."Setuju," jawab seluruh peserta atas disetujuinya Komjen Pol Idham Azis sebagai Kapolri.Mendapatkan dukungan yang begitu besar, ditambah support luar biasa seluruh Komisi III DPR RI untuk duduk sebagai Kapolri, Idham merasa tertantang untuk memberikan pengabdian lebih besar dan lebih baik lagi kepada bangsa dan negara."Mengutip pernyataan BJ Habibie, 'detik-detik yang menentukan' pada 1998 dimana tertulis, 'Kepada Tuhan, saya tidak akan bertanya mengapa, kenapa, dan bagaimana. Namun jika hamba diperkenankan mengajukan satu permohonan, berilah hamba petunjuk dan kekuatan untuk mengambil jalan yang benar sesuai dengan kehendak-Mu," pungkas Idham Azis.Akhirnya, pelantikan Jenderal Polisi Idham Azis sebagai Kepala Kepolisian Negara Republik Indonesia (Kapolri) sukses dilakukan. Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) melantik sekaligus menyematkan tanda pangkat Jenderal Polisi kepada Idham Azis, diakhiri dengan penyerahan tongkat komando Kapolri, di Istana Negara, Jakarta, Jumat (1/11/2019) lalu.BACA JUGA: Idham Azis Menuju Polri-1, 'Hanya Jalan yang Benar Sesuai Kehendak Tuhan'
Setelah semua proses pelantikan selesai, Idham pun mendapatkan selamat dari sejumlah hadirin yang diawali dari Presiden Jokowi dan Wakil Presiden Ma'ruf Amin. Setelah itu berturut-turut, sejumlah pejabat lainnya memberi selamat.Mereka antara lain Presiden ke-5 RI Megawati Soekarnoputri, Ketua DPR Puan Maharani, Ketua MPR Bambang Soesatyo, memberi ucapan selamat sambil melempar senyum bahagia. Setelah itu Ketua Umum NasDem Surya Paloh. Di belakang Paloh berdiri Menteri Pertahanan Prabowo Subianto.Ketika Prabowo berjalan ke arah Idham, mantan Kepala Badan Reserse Kriminal (Kabareskrim) Polri itu langsung menyapa terlebih dahulu."Siap, komandan!" kata Idham kepada Prabowo, dan mereka bersalaman dengan senyuman.Satu yang menarik usai pelantikan adalah saat Idham melayani wartawan untuk diambil foto. Ketika itulah dari wajah penuh sneyuman, tiba-tiba sang Kapolri menyudahi semua senyuman lantas memberikan isyarat dua jari berbentuk huruf 'L' namun dalam posisi seperti memegang handgun (pistol). Apa arti isyarat non verbal Idham Azis?Simbol JariDalam ilmu komunikasi, ada dua cara untuk menyampaikan pesan kepada seseorang, yaitu secara verbal dan non verbal. Jika verbal adalah melalui oral atau perkataan, untuk non verbal bisa menggunakan isyarat maupun hal lainnya dari bentuk sampai warna sekalipun.Sama dengan bahasa tubuh seseorang, jari yang membentuk simbol tertentu bisa menjadi tehnik penyampaian pesan secara non verbal kepada orang lain. Ada beberapa simbol jari dengan makna tertentu yang cukup dikenal oleh orang Indonesia.Seperti dilansir brightside.me yang dikutip oleh liputan6, ada 3 (tiga) makna simbol bentukan jari manusia yang menjadi bahasa isyarat paling umum di berbagai negara, khususnya Indonesia.1. Simbol OKIbu jari bertemu jari telunjuk membentuk bulatan dengan jari tengah, manis, dan kelingking mengacung sejajar, merupakan isyarat yang menandakan Oke, atau setuju di Indonesia. Untuk Amerika Serikat juga sama adanya. Akan tetapi, bagi orang Jepang, simbol itu dibaca sebagai uang.BACA JUGA: Tidak Mudah, 17 Pekerjaan Rumah Menanti (Kapolri) Idham Azis
Sementara itu di Brasil simbol yang dikatakan 'Oke' itu bermakna kasar. Anda mungkin bisa saja dihajar oleh kerumunan orang jika menunjukkan simbol tersbeut.2. Simbol V (Victory)Simbol ini untuk orang Indonesia dibaca victory atau kemenangan, dengan jari telunjuk dan tengah membentuk huruf 'V'. Simbol ini bisa pula dimaknai perdamaian, atau peace. Masyarakat Amerika Serikat juga memaknai simbol jari membentuk huruf "V" sebagai perdamaian untuk sebuah kemenangan.Sedangkan untuk di China, Jepang, Korea Selatan, Taiwan dan Thailand, jari 'V' dianggap sebagai pose lucu saat swafoto atau selfie.Sementara untuk orang Inggris, Afrika Selatan, Australia, Selandia Baru, Irlandia, ketika gerakan yang sama dilakukan tetapi dengan punggung tangan menghadap ke luar, itu merupakan penghinaan.3. Bentuk LUntuk di Amerika Serikat, simbol ibu jari dan jari telunjuk yang membentuk huruf 'L' biasa dimaknai sebagai ejekan yang artinya 'pecundang' atau loser (bahasa Inggris -red).Sementara di China, simbol ini dimaknai sebagai indikasi angka 8 yang dianggap sebagai angka keberuntungan. BACA JUGA: Idham Azis Disetujui Jadi Kapolri, Tantangan Berat Langsung menanti
Sedangkan untuk di Indonesia, simbol itu bisa juga dimaknai sebagai analogi senjata. Dengan simbol jari berbentuk handgun, bisa diartikan seseorang sedang mengirim pesan yang cukup keras terhadap orang lainnya atau kelompok. Tapi bentuk jari seperti itu juga sempat menjadi trend bentuk dukungan terhadap salah satu pasangan dalam proses Pilpres Maret-April 2019 yang lalu. Akan tetapi posisinya berbeda, karena jari telunjuk diacungkan ke atas.Sebuah 'Kode Keras'Idham Azis adalah sosok keras. Karirnya sebagai abdi masyarakat dan negara terbentuk dari tugas-tugas lapangan dalam jajaran reserse. Otomatis dirinya sudah akrab dengan penggerebekan, pengejaran, pemburuan DPO, bahkan sampai baku tembak dengan para kriminal.Komjen Pol Idham Azis merupakan perwira tinggi polisi kelahiran Kendari, Sulawesi Tenggara, 30 Januari 1963. Sebelum diajukan sebagai Kapolri oleh Presiden Joko Widodo, Idham Azis menjabat sebagai Kepala Badan Reserse Kriminal (Bareskrim) Polri.Idham yang lulusan Akademi Kepolisian 1988 ini berpengalaman dalam bidang reserse. Ia juga pernah menjabat sebagai Kapolda Metro Jaya.Sebelum menjabat Kabareskrim dan Kapolda Metro Jaya, Idham sudah malang melintang di berbagai satuan kepolisian. Ia juga pernah menjabat sebagai Kapolda Sulawesi Tengah.Bahkan, Idham juga pernah bertugas sebagai Wakil Kepala Densus 88/Antiteror Polri.Idham Azis adalah salah satu polisi yang mendapat kenaikan pangkat cukup cepat saat tergabung dalam tim Bareskrim. Apalagi, berbagai tugas berhasil diselesaikannya di antaranya Bom Bali II, Operasi Camar Maleo untuk menangkap kelompok Santoso, hingga Operasi Tinombala di Poso.Dalam penanganan anti-teror, salah satu prestasi yang diraihnya adalah ketika terlibat dalam operasi melumpuhkan dedengkot Jamaah Islamiya yang juga tersangka otak pelaksanaan bom Bali II, Dr Azhari. Saat itu, Azhari dilumpuhkan bersama kelompoknya di Batu, Jawa Timur, pada November 2005.BACA JUGA: Selamat Bertugas Kapolri Jenderal Polisi Idham Azis
Atas keberhasilan itu, Idham bersama rekan sekaligus pimpinannya, Tito Karnavian, Petrus Reinhard Golose, Rycko Amelza Dahniel, mendapat penghargaan dari Kapolri Jenderal Pol Sutanto.Pada malam harinya, 10 November 2005, Idham diminta untuk berangkat ke Poso. Ia pun terbang keesokan harinya dari Surabaya menuju Palu dan tiba di Poso untuk langsung bergabung dengan Tito Karnavian yang sudah berada di sana.Tito memintanya untuk menjadi wakil dalam kasus investigasi mutilasi tiga gadis Kristen yang terjadi di Poso. Per 12 November 2005, Idham resmi menjadi Wakil Ketua Satgas Bareskrim Poso, mendampingi Tito Karnavian.Atas kemampuannya di bidang anti-terorisme, Kapolri mempercayakan Idham menjabat di Sulawesi Tengah, yang kala itu rawan dengan kelompok sipil bersenjata.Penunjukan Idham sebagai Kapolri, terlebih sebagai calon tunggal memang karena penilaian semua rekam jejaknya itu. Dengan Idham di pucuk pimpinan, negara menggantungkan keamanan masyarakat di pundaknya.Bahkan untuk tugas-tugas di kepolisian saja, Idham tidak mengizinkan isteri dan anak-anaknya ikut campur. Sampai demikian sikapnya memandang sebuah tugas negara. Akan tetapi, dibalik sosok keras Idham, dia tidak pernah lupa bahwa di belakang pria sukses ada sosok perempuan luar biasa. Idham melihat itu dari sosok isterinya, Fitri Handari.Sebelum menghadap Presiden Jokowi, dia pulang ke rumah menemui Fitri untuk bicara. Idham minta restu dan doa dari sang isteri. Itu diungkapkannya saat panitia fit and proper test Komisi III DPR RI datang bertandnag ke rumahnya, Rabu, 30 Oktober 2019. Tujuan para anggota dewan adalah melihat langsung kehidupan pribadinya bersama keluarga, sebagai salah satu bahan penilaian untuk menentukan layak tidaknya dia duduk sebagai Kapolri.Menutup pertemuan di kediamannya, Idham sedikit bercerita tentang sang isteri. Idham menuturkan kekagumannya terhadap isteri yang sabar mendampinginya dalam kedinasan Polri, selalu ada di sisinya dalam susah dan senang. Menurutnya, banyak orang mengatakan ia seorang ayah yang hebat karena mampu membagi waktu antara pekerjaan dengan anak-anak dan isteri di rumah. Tapi Idham malah membeberkan rahasia penting kepada orang-orang tersebut."Saya bilang, mamanya yang hebat. Saya hanya bagian kualitatif saja, tapi isteri saya menangani yang kuantitatif (lebih besar). Dia kuantitasnya," imbuhnya.

ANALYSIS: Sign Language, Reading the Police 'Hard Code'
03 Nov 2019, 21:43 by Miechell Octovy Koagouw


ANALYSIS: Sign Language, Reading the Police 'Hard Code'

KBRN, Jakarta: Indonesian House Speaker Puan Maharani chaired a plenary session to hear the presentation of the results of the House of Representatives Commission III fit and proper test on a new National Police candidate, Commissioner General of Police (Komjen Pol) Idham Azis, at the Parliament Complex Senayan Jakarta, Thursday (10/31) /2019).From 575 members of the Indonesian Parliament, 361 people were present and all unanimously approved Komjen Pol Idham Azis as the new National Police Chief replacing Police General Tito Karnavian. so great, coupled with the extraordinary support of all the House of Representatives Commission III to sit as National Police Chief, Idham felt challenged to provide greater and better service to the nation and state. "To quote BJ Habibie's statement, 'the decisive seconds' in 1998 where written, 'To God, I will not ask why, why, and how. But if I am allowed to submit one request, give me the instructions and strength to take the right path according to your will, "concluded Idham Azis. Finally, the inauguration of Police General Idham Azis as Chief of the Republic of Indonesia National Police (Kapolri) was successfully carried out. President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) installed and pinned the rank of Police General to Idham Azis, ending with the surrender of the Kapolri command stick, at the State Palace, Jakarta, last Friday (1/11/2019). READ ALSO: Idham Azis Towards Polri-1, 'Only the Right Way According to God's Will'
After all the inauguration process was completed, Idham also received congratulations from a number of attendees, starting with President Jokowi and Vice President Ma'ruf Amin. After that in succession, a number of other officials congratulated. They included the 5th President of the Republic of Indonesia Megawati Soekarnoputri, Speaker of the Parliament Puan Maharani, Chair of the MPR Bambang Soesatyo, congratulating him with a happy smile. After that the General Chairman of NasDem Surya Paloh. Behind Paloh stood Defense Minister Prabowo Subianto.When Prabowo walked towards Idham, the former head of the National Police Criminal Investigation Agency (Kabareskrim) immediately greeted him first. "Ready, commander!" Idham said to Prabowo, and they shook hands with a smile. One interesting thing after the inauguration was when Idham served reporters for photographs. That's when from the smiling face, suddenly the Chief of Police completed all smiles and then gave a two-finger gesture in the shape of the letter 'L' but in a position like holding a handgun (pistol). What is the meaning of non-verbal cues Idham Azis? Finger Symbols In communication science, there are two ways to convey a message to someone, namely verbally and nonverbally. If verbal is through oral or speech, for non-verbal can use signs or other things from shape to color though. Same with a person's body language, fingers that form certain symbols can be techniques for delivering non-verbal messages to others. There are several finger symbols with certain meanings that are quite well known by Indonesians. As reported by brightside.me quoted by liputan6, there are 3 (three) meanings of human finger formation symbols which are the most common sign language in various countries, especially Indonesia.1. The OKI symbol of the finger meeting the index finger forming a circle with the middle, ring and pinkie fingers pointing in parallel, is a signal that indicates OK, or agree in Indonesia. For the United States it is the same. However, for Japanese people, the symbol is read as money. READ ALSO: Not Easy, 17 Homework Awaits (Chief of Police) Idham Azis
Meanwhile in Brazil the symbol which is said to be 'OK' means rude. You might be beaten by a crowd if you show that symbol. Symbol V (Victory) This symbol is for Indonesians to read victory or victory, with the index finger and middle forming the letter 'V'. This symbol can also be interpreted as peace, or peace. The people of the United States also interpret the finger symbol to form the letter "V" as peace for a victory. While for China, Japan, South Korea, Taiwan and Thailand, the finger 'V' is considered as a funny pose when taking selfies or selfies. South Africa, Australia, New Zealand, Ireland, when the same movements are carried out but with the back of the hand facing outward, it is an insult. In the United States, the symbol of the thumb and index finger forming the letter 'L' is usually interpreted as a mockery which means 'loser' or loser (English-ed). While in China, this symbol is interpreted as an indication of the number 8 which is considered as a number 8 lucky number. READ ALSO: Idham Azis Approved to Become Chief of Police, Direct Challenges await
As for Indonesia, the symbol can also be interpreted as an analogy to weapons. With a handgun-shaped finger symbol, it means someone is sending a message loud enough to another person or group. But the shape of the finger like that also had become a trend form of support for one of the couples in the March-April 2019 Presidential Election process ago. However, the position is different, because the index finger is raised upward. A 'Hard Code' Azis is a hard figure. His career as a public servant and the state was formed from field duties in the ranks of detectives. Automatically he was already familiar with raids, chases, DPO hunts, even to shootout with criminals. Police Commissioner General Idham Azis was a high-ranking police officer born in Kendari, Southeast Sulawesi, 30 January 1963. Before being proposed as National Police Chief by President Joko Widodo, Idham Azis served as as Head of the Criminal Investigation Agency (Bareskrim) of the Indonesian National Police. Abi, who graduated from the 1988 Police Academy, has experience in the field of detective. He also served as Metro Jaya Police Chief. Before serving as Kabareskrim and Kapolda Metro Jaya, Idham had been poor across various police units. He has also served as the Central Sulawesi Regional Police Chief. In fact, Idham has also served as Deputy Chief of Detachment 88 / Antiterror Polri. Ahmad Azis is one of the police officers who got a promotion quite quickly when he joined the Bareskrim team. Moreover, various tasks were successfully accomplished including the Bali Bomb II, Operation Male Camar to capture Santoso group, to the Tinombala Operation in Poso.In handling anti-terror, one of the achievements he achieved was when he was involved in an operation paralyzing the deduction of Jamaah Islamiya who was also a brain suspect Bali bombing II, Dr. Azhari. At that time, Azhari was paralyzed with his group in Batu, East Java, in November 2005. READ ALSO: Happy Acting Chief of Police, Police General Idham Azis
For this success, Idham along with his colleague and leader, Tito Karnavian, Petrus Reinhard Golose, Rycko Amelza Dahniel, received an award from the National Police Chief General Sutanto. On the night of November 10, 2005, Idham was asked to leave for Poso. He flew the next day from Surabaya to Palu and arrived in Poso to immediately join Tito Karnavian who was already there. Tito asked him to be a representative in the investigation of the mutilation of three Christian girls that occurred in Poso. As of November 12, 2005, Idham officially became Deputy Chairperson of the Poso Bareskrim Task Force, accompanying Tito Karnavian. Regarding his ability in the field of anti-terrorism, the National Police Chief entrusted Idham to serve in Central Sulawesi, which at that time was prone to armed civilian groups. the single candidate is indeed due to the assessment of all of his track records. With Idham at the helm, the state is hanging the security of the community on its shoulders. Even for police work, Idham does not allow his wife and children to interfere. Until then his attitude looked at a state duty. However, behind the hard figure of Idham, he never forgot that behind a successful man there was an extraordinary woman. Idham saw that from the figure of his wife, Fitri Handari. Before facing President Jokowi, he returned home to meet Fitri to speak. Idham asked for his blessing and prayer. He revealed that when the committee of fit and proper test of Commission III of the Indonesian House of Representatives came to his house on Wednesday, October 30, 2019. The purpose of the members of the council was to see firsthand his personal life with his family, as one of the evaluation materials to determine whether he was fit to sit as National Police Chief. meeting at his residence, Idham talked a little about his wife. Idham said his admiration for his wife who patiently accompanied him in the service of the National Police, always by his side in difficulty and pleasure. According to him, many people said he was a great father because he was able to divide the time between work with children and wife at home. But Idham instead revealed important secrets to these people. "I said, his great mother. I was only a qualitative part, but my wife handled the quantitative (greater). He quantity," he added.
